text: @SulAwad We should all take a step back and a take deep breath. Let's amplify our achievements and correct mistakes. We R all in same boat.
@SulAwad Very easy to take things for granted and to think grass greener on the other side. Till you get there! We have much to b grateful 4
@oliviaamr Thank you for taking part in the Rauma Mountain Festival. The first time I have walked in wild and beautiful mountains in Romsdalen.
From my trench, giving the Battle for life, I congratulate the entire country for that wonderful inauguration of the ALBA Games!
Very good for the Great MissionViviendaVenezuela! I congratulate Vice President Rafael Ramírez. See that army of builders! We will live AND we will come!
And now ... Waiting for football! There comes La Vinotinto! And come undefeated! Inspired! Overcome!!
Sleiman at the Amchit dinner: "We should launch the national dialogue to implement the national charter"
"The past years shown that the constitutional gaps are serious, which halted the president from settling the issues" #lebanon
"I will launch a series of consultations to agree on a national defense strategy." The Israeli threats makes us more determined "
Goooooooooooooooooooollllllll from La Patria! Long live Venezuela! Here watching the game with Fidel !!! We will live and we will expire !!
Fidel came and brought luck to the Vinotinto. He sang the Goal and "guessed the victory". Overcome! Now you will see the 2nd time from home!
@atilioboron. Hello my dear Atilio! Well, Fidel and Chávez, together with our relatives and the entire medical team, send you a big hug!
Oh, compadreeeeeee !!!! That Golazoooooooooooo! Bravo Venezuela!
Glory to the brave people!!! We pay supreme tribute to our boys of the Glorious Vinotinto !! Viva Venezuela! We will live and we will expire !!
I look forward to fruitful talks with Prime Minister Cameron, and later the launch of the ANC 1million membership campaign at Rivonia...
...ending the day with a courtesy call on #Madiba In Qunu. Happy birthday Tata! #MandelaDay
Good morning Happy World! Good morning Venezuela Bella! From here, ready for another day of BatallaPorLaVida.Viviremos and Venceremos! I love them!!
Look! Hey! Good thing our Vice President Giordani is with Ernesto! Dale Jorge! Greetings Ernesto and all that great team of 8!
Good evening, Countrymen! Around here, closing another day of this Battle for Life. With an insurmountable optimism! Fidel came again!
Good morning, Living World! Good morning Venezuela Amada! Here we go, I'm ready to start the battle today! We will live and we will expire !!
Joint announcement of socialist leaders on the crisis in the Eurozone http://t.co/zPlyLUE
Here are some of the ways jobs will be protected in Australia's clean energy future http://t.co/TciMMdg JG
Hello girls and boys from "TodaVenezuela". I inform: I have just approved 162 mill. For the FranciscoDeMiranda Front. We will live and come again!
Hey, that's good that "Guardian from the air". It was much needed. Congratulations! Good for the Bolivarian National Police and the channel8.Live!
I keep informing: I have just approved extraordinary resources for the Government of Merida (220 mill. Bs.) SaludosaMérida! # We will live and we will come again!
I continue to inform: for my beloved Caracas, I have approved 111 mill.Bs for the new Toilet Company "SUp
I continue to inform: for my beloved Caracas, I have just approved 111 mill.Bs for the new Toilet Company "SUPRA-CARACAS" # We will live and come back !!
Happy birthday to my friend, colleague, brother and comrade, Deputy President Kgalema Motlanthe! Have many many more!  http://t.co/MB3COjH
@kensuperstar Greet her from me!
Bravo for that New Police! I congratulate you and congratulate you! Let's continue building the New Venezuela! For this, we need that PolicePatria!
@FelipeCalderon Listen President Calderón, my friend, I thank you for your good wishes. And I send my affections to you and the beloved Mexican people!
@DaBlinkMagazine. I will let you kno in a moment in a number issues I want to tweet about-that area will be covered-Thanks
Proud of Hushovd and Boasson Hagen http://t.co/3KOGFJM #TdF
Telephone communications with heads of political parties in view of the forthcoming Summit http://t.co/Vr15QQY
Epa comrade PérezPirela! From my battle trench I greet you and all that team of CayendoyCorriendo! FollowAtizandoContradicciones!
@EvelVargaS. Amen Evel. God bless you!!
@Luisgguerra Epa Luis! Here we go brother! With God and the Virgin! We will live and we will win!

More than half of the money raised by the #CarbonPrice will be used to assist households. This is how - http://t.co/pwJq40B JG
Forward with LaGranMisiónAgroVenezuela! Greetings to my beloved AgroVenezolanos! Thank you, compañera portusbendiciones.Amén! We will live and we will come again!
Epa! Here, waiting for the tremendous game. Nicolás arrived ... And it seems that Fidel is coming to watch the game with us! We will live and we will come back !!
We deserve the triumph, more than anyone and more than ever before !! Viva Venezuela! We will live and we will come! Come Vinotinto! To put them all!
Venezuela Great! Live the Homeland !! We were the best! We will live and we will come back !!
The #carbonprice won't apply to the fuel you put in your car. Here are the facts - http://t.co/RYIy2Pn JG
Attends the extra eurozone summit this afternoon, where the financial stability of the euro zone and the support to Greece are discussed.
About extra top eurozone: 'A very important meeting. It's about the future of our jobs and our pensions. "
RT @EUCouncilTVNews: Eurozone Summit - July 2011 - Arrival and transfer Rutte (NL) http://bit.ly/r0ZrtT
Now I hear the National Anthem! Oh, my country, how much I love you! You are, together with my Children, together with my People and their struggle, the greatest Reason for Life!
Good morning, Good World! From my Headquarters, we who are going to VivirVivindo, we greet you!
Truly true, Our Vinotinto Won last night! Paraguay did not win that game. Both Fidel and I saw clearly the Goal they took from us !!
But why on earth was that referee going to nullify that spectacular goal? Advanced one of our Glorious Gunners? Well, none!
In my modest opinion and based on observable facts, THE ROLE OF THE VICTORY WAS STEALED! And I hope that this does not offend anyone!
I think we should raise our voice because we have the authority to do so, before CONMEBOL. Greetings to our great friend Nicolás Leo.!
Friend Leo, we must take care of our Copa America! I wish we could talk about this. I confess that our compatriot and friend César Farías
César spoke with me about "some little things" that sometimes slip into these competitions! Especially in arbitration! Let's check, Leo!
To our DirectorTechnician and Leader, César Farías, my message: you can repeat as a Cesar, together with all our boys: "VINI, VIDI, VINCI"
And our boys: Go Big! Go Honor to have them! They are part of what A.Mijares called "The Venezuelan Affirmative" !!
"Greece will continue to support, with all its powers, the Republic of Cyprus" http://t.co/NB4Wk95
Arango, Captain Companion, from here a big hug, for you and for each one of our boys! I'm with you! We will live and come again!
"For a Eurozone based on a democratically controlled economic policy" http://t.co/zPlyLUE
The Summit-Meeting with Chancellor Angela Merkel is in progress http://twitpic.com/5thaou
A few minutes ago I spoke with our César! The César Farías! There were all our Champions on the plane that takes them to Bnos.Aires.Pa'lante!
This Bolivar Park Project is a true gift of the Bolivarian Revolution for our beautiful Caracas !! Bravo Farruco! We will live!
Pr Sleiman is now the proud grandfather of twin boys, Nabil and Cyril! Congratulations to Nabil and Lara Sleiman Hawat and all their family!
After the eurozone summit: 'There is an agreement with the very strong involvement of the private sector. Good result for the Netherlands and for the EU '.
RT @euHvR: Today we have improved the Greek debt sustainability; we took measures to stop the risk of contagion (cont.) http://t.co/svmOa3r #euco
I asked for a solution now. Overall and effective. Who will give us all the time we need to make the big changes.
RT @EUCouncilPress: Full text of the Euro area leaders & EU institutions approved at today's summit http://ow.ly/5KieD ...
Today's decisions guarantee our sustainable course. They guarantee the sustainability of our debt, reduce service burdens.
Greece will change. Radically, decisively. It is the only way for our children not to live again the deadly threat of debt.
RT @EUCouncilTVNews: Eurozone Summit - July 2011 - National briefing: Netherlands - Part 1 http://bit.ly/qA2IBw
Let us take advantage of the credible and creative power that the Greek has within us to change our country.
We have claimed and achieved the right of Greek and Greek in the hope of http://t.co/m97iD7e
Settlers and settlers: I am with you. We will continue living and populating this Homeland Ours !! We will live and we will win!
What a beautiful meeting we had this afternoon with Fidel, Raúl and Rafael Correa, who wanted to come and visit us. We closed singing El AlmaLlanera!
I am here feeding myself of so much emotion in that tremendous international meeting of the popular housing. Only PuebloSalva al Pueblo !!!
Epa, already began to arrive from China thousands of construction machines that The Revolution will deliver to the People's Power! People with Power!
Hey, do you know who sends them a good Revolutionary hug? Well, nothing less than Fidel! To the inhabitants!
Video: "Tough negotiation has led to historic decisions guaranteeing the country's sustainable course" http://t.co/zwzoLzZ

Video: Press conference after the conclusion of the Summit http://t.co/zwzoLzZ
Good morning, Living World! Friday, Friday, ah, today is Friday! July 22 also! And this Will to Live what it does is to grow in me!
Touch of Diana in this Retaining Barracks! Upstairs, the sun is coming out! Up, that whoever gets up early, God helps him! #We will live and come back!
Blog: "We have claimed and achieved the right of the Greek and Greek in the hope" http://t.co/m97iD7e
Listen, how pleasant it is to start the morning reading "Cantaclaro": "The savannah starts at the foot of the Andean mountain range" ... And now, walk!
Good morning Dahir; good morning Ernesto. How are you? Epa Garcés, the Rookie of the Year; pa'lante with that GranPlan de Obras Públicas!
Comrade Minister Garcés, remember that the GranPlan de ObrasPúblicas is part of the Great MissionSaberYTrabajoVenezuela! # We will live and come again !!
Meeting with the President of the Republic, Karolos Papoulias, at 3 pm at the Presidential Palace

"The attack in Oslo shows a complete lack of respect for human lives. I wish MP Stoltenberg and the Norwegian people a lot of strength. '
This is a very serious situation, and my thoughts now go to all who are affected. I am in constant contact with the ministers and professional staff.
Video: "We now have a new program and a set of decisions that create a sustainable course for Greece" http://t.co/GeyfTrv
Today we are hit by two shocking, bloody and fiery attacks. Much is still uncertain. Tonight we must all stand together and take care of each other.
Today, we have been hit by two savage and cowardly attacks. Tonight, we all stand together, taking care of each other.
RT @Arbeiderpartiet: Today Norway is hit by two shocking, bloody and fiery attacks, says @jensstoltenberg: http://t.co/Q0WlURb
I am very grateful for all the care and concern from all parts of the world, and from my colleagues in many countries.
I thank Diego Armando Maradona for the fraternal visit he gave me this afternoon. We were together with Fidel. Thanks Pibe! We will live!
Walter Martinez goes tonight with a Special Dossier. It's about the meeting this afternoon at LaHabana! Thanks Walter! We will live And we will come!
Africa optimism rising:http://t.co/7xda31f

The sun comes out in Havana! Good Morning, Smiling World! Good morning, Singing Life! Good morning, Venezuela Bella! We will live and we will win!
Good luck tonight @CadelOfficial. Australia is behind you! #yellforcadel #sbstdf #tdf JG
RT @VGpluss: Les Hanne Skartveit's comment: Today we are all AUFers. From VG + on iPad: http://t.co/v8LxLpa
Epa, Revolutionary greetings to all there in Guarenas! Long live the Popular Power! You're right, comrade, if Christ is with us, who is us?
I join your prayer brothers! Amen! We will live and we will win!
Go, Giordani! Pa'lante comrade! Go Elias Comrade! All Power for the People! Long live the town of Miranda! We will live AND we will come!
Epa compadre, comadre, how are you all in Anzoátegui? Know that I am hunting you here. Very good Isis speech! Socialism! That's!
Epa, AgroVenezolanos! What emotion it gives me to see how the Revolution advances! Father Rojas, I receive your blessings! Hugs Comrade Loyo. Pa'lante !!
Let's go guys! Long live Venezuela! Live the Vinotinto !!
@jensstoltenberg My deepest condolences on the tragedy that has struck Norway, claiming many innocent lives.
@MedvedevRussiaE @FelipeCalderon @euHvR Thank you for your words of support to the Norwegian people.
Takk for solidariteten med norske folket. Støtten fra det internationale samfund er en stor styrke.
Thank you for all support and touching feedback. We must all support the injured and relatives, and stand together in this heavy age.
@umutonijovania. Bless you, too! Thank you
